sentences.en: Althusser's writings are focused mainly on France.
sentences.cn: 阿尔都塞的著作主要是论述法国的。

sentences.en: At one time the schools were mainly attached to the church.
sentences.cn: 这些学校曾一度归教会主管。

sentences.en: He let out a long sigh, mainly of relief, partly of sadness.
sentences.cn: 他长叹一口气，主要是因为如释重负，也有一部分是因为伤心。

sentences.en: He raises crops mainly for the use of his family.
sentences.cn: 他种农作物主要是为了家庭自用。

sentences.en: Her illness was caused mainly by stress.
sentences.cn: 她的病主要是由精神压力引起的。

sentences.en: I don’t go out much, mainly because I have to look after the kids.
sentences.cn: 我不大出去，主要是因为我得照看孩子们。

sentences.en: I think I've been very selfish. I've been mainly concerned with myself.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我一直非常自私。总是只关心自己。

sentences.en: Increased sales during the summer were mainly due to tourism.
sentences.cn: 夏季销售额增加主要是由旅游业带动的。

sentences.en: Many of the islands are mainly wild and underpopulated.
sentences.cn: 大多数岛屿基本上都是一片荒凉、渺无人烟。

sentences.en: Our survey revealed that these allergies were mainly one-offs.
sentences.cn: 我们的调查显示这些过敏多为一次性反应。

sentences.en: The committee ruled against all-night opening mainly on safety grounds.
sentences.cn: 委员会反对通宵营业主要是出于安全方面的考虑。

sentences.en: The group is mainly black, mainly working-class.
sentences.cn: 这个团体主要由黑人组成，而且大多是工人阶级。

sentences.en: The Paris talks will mainly be about procedural matters.
sentences.cn: 巴黎会谈将主要围绕程序上的事宜。

sentences.en: The Pike lives mainly in large rivers and lakes.
sentences.cn: 狗鱼主要生活在大江大湖中。

sentences.en: The spacious main bedroom is mainly blue.
sentences.cn: 宽敞的主卧室以蓝色为主色调。

sentences.en: The workforce is mainly made up of women.
sentences.cn: 员工主要是女性。

sentences.en: There were also several accidents mainly caused by engine failures on take-off.
sentences.cn: 还有几次事故主要是起飞时引擎出现故障造成的。

sentences.en: They eat mainly fruit and nuts.
sentences.cn: 他们主要吃水果和坚果。

sentences.en: We import raw materials and energy and export mainly in-dustrial products.
sentences.cn: 我们进口原材料和能源，主要出口工业产品。

sentences.en: We talked about various things – work, mainly.
sentences.cn: 我们谈了各种各样的事情——主要是谈工作。

words.tran_cn: 主要的，最重要的；全力的
主要部分，要点；体力；总管道
主要动力；（钟表）主发条；主要原因；主要动机
支柱；中流砥柱；主要的依靠；主桅支索

trans.tran_en: used to mention the main part or cause of something, the main reason for something etc
